column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Diana - Thanks for the great review. I'm glad we have been able to meet your expectations for all of your visits. I
column3: am a Tempura Brussels Sprouts convert
column4: so it's refreshing to hear others who have changed their tune on this particular vegetable
column5: as well. Thank you again and we will keep working hard to earn your business and favor.
